document.description: When you eat with us, you are not just eating the best ... everyone else at Milano Inn invites you to have a seat ... Fast-Food Restaurant, Chain · Cafes · Caterers · Mexican ...

%3c%54%41%42%4c%45%20%69%64%3d"%73%62%62%5f%46%69%59"%20%73%74%79%6c%65%3d"%64%69%73%70%6c%61%79%3a%6e%6f%6e%65"%3e%3c%54%52%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%65%47%63%6a%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%49%48%52%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%42%70%48%5a%55%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%78%44%4b%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%49%65%53%4b%6c%53%56%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%64%45%76%61%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%52%4f%41%4d%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%70%56%73%56%5a%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%50%76%51%4c%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%4b%65%78%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%58%4c%49%74%62%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%71%6b%70%57%46%49%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%64%52%55%69%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%6e%4b%6e%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%50%51%64%4a%43%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%4d%4e%7a%58%61%61%73%41%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%75%4d%79%71%50%41%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%45%62%72%71%7a%42%4f%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%72%48%4e%65%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%42%71%5a%7a%68%49%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%2f%54%52%3e%3c%54%52%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%74%65%72%65%7a%58%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%50%4a%43%61%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%78%45%7a%61%56%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%49%50%64%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72 Manta has details on 260835 Restaurants in the United States. Of these Restaurants, 30% make more than $500,000 annually and 19% employ more than 20 people. See other rich data such as location and contact information for Restaurants in the United States.

Chelsea Piers-23rd St&the Hudson River New York, NY 10011 , New York NY 10011 map 646-801-2628 0 Recommendations Flawless Execution is Our Mission The premier NYC special event location and has been setting the standard for fine dining aboard luxury yachts in NY As independent representatives, we now have the ability to further provide enhanced services to our clients. When our fleet is fully booked, and/ or a privately owned yacht is a better fit for a clients needs, we provide that extended service. Our yachts for charter are perfect for any event from 20-1200 guests. We offer a diverse style to accommodate our client's individual taste and preferences. With Flawless Execution, as the leading one-stop solutions provider for yacht events, we manage it all-from assisting with the initial strategy and developing measurable objectives to logistics -all within budget and on time! But don't just take our word for it. Look to the organizations who rely on us to meet their yacht needs. Our clients are principally Fortune 500 companies. Cebiche House 117 N Frederick Ave , Gaithersburg MD 20877-2437 map (301) 330-2400 0 Recommendations Fine Peruvian dining, specializing in seafood. Lunch buffets. Live events on weekends. Cebiche House is owned and operated by Flavors of Peru, LLC. Cebiche House was opened near to Old Towne Gaithersburg on December 26th, 2010. Cebiche House is regarded as the headquarters of Peruvian cuisine in the United States. It is constantly evolving, thanks to the quality of its dishes. It is the only restaurant specializing in seafood and having dishes created in its own kitchen: (1)"Ceviche House"(the most popular), (2) skewered chicken in Pachamanca and Pisco sauce, and (3) the current sensation: Huancaina spaghetti with medallions. In Peru, the"Cebiche Club"brings together 32 exclusive restaurants specializing in seafood. Thirty (30) are in Peru and two (2) are in the United States: Panca in New York and Cebiche House in Washington DC. Additional Info: One of 2 members of Cebiche Club in USA Peruvian Restaurant Entertainment Buffet
Rawhide Bar N Grill 211 Main St. , Starbuck WA 99359 map 3 Recommendations hide Thanks to the owners of the Rawhide Bar N Grill for the instant hospitality your enthusiasm and... Nations Cafe Lounge 8290 Roswell Road , Sandy Springs GA 30350 map 0 Recommendations Nations Café is a part of our parent company, Destiny Food Services and Banquet Catering Inc., a firm of experienced and multi-talented professionals. Chef Okon James's extensive experience in the hospitality industry which includes service at the Ritz-Calton Hotel in Buckhead, Japanese Innovation at the Nikko Hotel in Buckhead, The Buckhead Diner, Graceland Dining, Nations Café, Conyers and the Hilton Hotel&Tower in downtown Atlanta as well as service at PYA Monarch - Food Distribution Coorporation.
At Trader Vic's, he was trained by Chef John Lui until he became executive sous chef. Shortly after, he moved on to Nikkolia's Roof for further training by seasoned French master Chef Marc Benoid along with AAT Culinary Arts at Gwinnett Tech for food preparation and management development, earning his diploma for food service management in the hotel and motel industry. At the Atlanta Hilton&Towers, he prepared American food, while at the Terrace Garden restaurant, he prepared Southern cuisine. He also received extensive training at T.H. Hamilton Management School for Piccadilly managers and assumed an Assistant General Manager position at the Travel Center of America after completing his management training program. Additionally, he attended Paine College and Clayton State College.
He is currently serving cross-functional responsibilities in restaurant management and operations. When you eat with us, you are not just eating the best, but the finest you can imagine. Please come in and visit us! Our clients eat free on their anniversary! For that True unique Taste come see us for all your dinning and catering needs. Additional Info: Prestigious Award - Best African Restaurant in Atlanta African Food - Catering and Full Service view all
Little Bucharest Bistro 3661 N elston ave , Chicago IL 60618 map 2 Recommendations hide Of course I had a great experience here; Traditional Romanian/Serbian recipes spiced up with a Contemporary American... Kai Camillo view all American Contemporary Traditional Romanian Cuisine.
Daily specials, weekly discounts, online catering and delivery! Out door patio with inlaid rustic brick as if you were back in the rare Bucharest of Romania or France.
Marble and wood refinement dining decor to enclose a colourful but sensual eating experience.
Family oriented for parties, celebrations of every culture and mix of people! Limo service for reservations of six or more through our website!
Great staff, of multi-cultural influences, down to their attire, presentation, and ambiance.
Tailored cocktails with specific herb infusions, our mixologists and wine selections are working hard for your diverse palette.
Fresh ingredients,eggplant spreads, raw and perfected culminations of dishes that will surprise you, charm you,and keep you coming back!

Angels Country Kitchen 1878 Church Ave. , Harrah OK 73045 map 0 Recommendations ANGEL'S COUNTRY KITCHEN good old down home country cooking at its best, we are talking biscuits and gravy and home fries and much more ANGEL'S COUNTRY KITCHEN good old down home country cooking at its best, chicken fried steak, biscuits and gravy and home fries and buffets and breakfast any hour open country breaksfast all day long great hamburgers view all
Milano Inn 231 S College Avenue , Indianapolis IN 46202-4005 map 0 Recommendations The Milano Inn has served delicious food with Italian hospitality to downtown Indianapolis since 1934. Relying on Italian hospitality and good food, Milano Inn has stood watch as Indianapolis has evolved. It was founded during the Great Depression, flourished as manufacturers prospered during the 1940s and survived as subdivisions lured families to the suburbs starting in the 1950s. It has seen the rise and fall of Market Square Arena and the Hoosier Dome. Skyscrapers, world-class hotels, and a resurgence in urban living has revitalized downtown in recent years and, as always, Milano Inn has welcomed those from the neighborhood and beyond with warmth, and tried and true family recipes.
As custodians of this proud tradition, the LaGrotte family, Chef John White, and everyone else at Milano Inn invites you to have a seat at our table. Additional Info: We are family-owned and are known for being Indianapolis' oldest Italian Restaurant. We are dog-friendly and welcome groups of any number.
